items.todoItem: Know that God made the heavens and the earth.
Thou shalt have no other gods before me.
Thou shalt not make unto thee any graven image.
Thou shalt not take the name of the Lord thy God in vain.
Remember the sabbath day, to keep it holy.
Honour thy father and thy mother.
Honour thy father and thy mother that thy days may be long upon the earth.
Thou shalt not kill.
Thou shalt not commit adultery.
Thou shalt not steal.
Thou shalt not bear false witness against thy neighbour.
Thou shalt not covet.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is merciful.
Love strangers.
Remember you were once a stranger yourself.
Meditate on God’s word day and night.
Don’t be afraid for the Lord your God is with you wherever you go.
Choose this day who you will serve.
Know that he who honours God will himself be honoured.
In times of great distress, encourage yourself in the Lord.
Know that God promised that the Messiah would be of the seed of David.
Know that God stated that the Messiah would be His Son.
Know that God is always ready to forgive.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is merciful.
Know that God is slow to anger.
Know that God is of great kindness.
Make a covenant with your eyes like Job did.
Don’t walk in the counsel of the ungodly.
Don’t stand in the way of sinners.
Don’t sit in the seat of the scornful.
Avoid evil influences, deeds and attitudes.
Know that God blesses the godly.
Delight in the Word of God.
Meditate on the Word of God day and night.
Know that godliness leads to blessing and prosperity.
Know that the ungodly shall not prosper and have no future.
Know that the ungodly will find no place in the congregation of the righteous when judged.
Know that the way of the ungodly shall perish.
Serve the Lord with fear and rejoice with trembling.
Kiss the Son.
Stand in awe and sin not.
Know that the meek shall eat and be satisfied.
Know that the earth and everything in it belong to the Lord.
Let the Lord teach you and guide you.
Be glad in the Lord, rejoice and shout for joy.
Sing a new song to Him. Play skillfully with a loud noise.
Stand in awe of Him.
Let His praise be continually in your mouth.
Taste and see that the Lord is good.
Don’t be envious of the wicked.
Rest in the Lord and wait patiently for Him.
Cease from anger and forsake wrath.
Know that unforgiven sin deprives us of peace and rest.
Know that our sins weigh us down like a heavy burden that is too heavy for us until our conscience is cleared with God.
Call upon God in the day of trouble: He will deliver you!
Wait upon God: from Him comes salvation.
Pour out your heart before God for He is your refuge.
Trust in God at all times.
Praise Him continually.
Know that God is continually with us.
Know that God holds us continually by our right hand.
Know that God guides us with His counsel and afterward will receive us into glory.
Know that it is good for us to draw near to God.
Open your mouth wide and allow no one but God to fill it.
Defend the poor and fatherless.
Deliver the poor and needy.
Know that God is compassionate.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is plenteous in mercy and truth.
Dwell in the secret place of the most High and abide in the shadow of the Almighty.
Give thanks unto the Lord for He is good.
Give thanks unto the Lord for His mercy endures for ever.
Know that God has redeeemed you from the hand of the enemy.
Praise the Lord for His goodness and wonderful works to the children of men.
Know that it is the Lord that fills the hungry soul with goodness.
Know that it is the Lord that satisfies the longing soul.
Call upon the name of the Lord.
Seek God with your whole heart.
Refrain your feet from every evil way.
Give thanks unto the Lord.
Praise Him for you are fearfully and wonderfully made.
Know that the Lord is gracious and full of compassion.
Know that the Lord is slow to anger and of great mercy.
Know that the Lord is good to all.
Seek out wise counsellors.
Fear the Lord.
Hear the advice of your father and mother and don’t ignore it.
Don’t be enticed by sinners.
Don’t consent to go with sinners.
Don’t be greedy of gain.
Hear the voice of wisdom.
Turn around at wisdom’s reproof.
Choose the fear of the Lord.
Know that those who follow after wisdom shall dwell in safety and free from fear of evil.
Cry after knowledge and lift up your voice for understanding.
Keep to the paths of the righteous.
Walk in the way of good men.
Don’t forget the Lord’s teaching and His ways.
Bind mercy and truth around your neck.
Let not mercy and truth forsake thee.
Treasure mercy and truth and exhibit them in the way that you live.
Take mercy and truth to heart and meditate upon them.
Don’t lean on your own understanding.
Put your trust fully in the Lord and not yourself.
Trust in the Lord with all your heart.
Involve God everywhere you go and in everything you do.
Depart from evil.
Don’t be wise in your own eyes.
Honour the Lord with your substance and first fruits of all your increase.
Use your possessions to honour God.
Don’t despise the chastening of the Lord.
Don’t grow weary of the Lord’s correction.
Expect the Lord’s correction because He loves you.
Know that whom the Lord loves He corrects.
Recognise the true value of wisdom.
Demonstrate sound wisdom and discretion.
Don’t be afraid of sudden fear.
Make the Lord your confidence.
Don’t withhold good from them to whom it is due.
Help anyone and everyone that is in your power to help.
Don’t argue with someone for no reason.
Know that the Lord gives grace to the lowly.
Attend to know understanding.
Wisdom is the principle thing - therefore get wisdom.
With all thy getting get understanding.
Embrace and exalt wisdom.
Take firm hold of instruction and don’t let go.
Put away from you a froward mouth.
Put perverse lips far from you.
Don’t go astray in the paths of the strange woman.
Don’t refuse instruction.
Hear instruction and be wise.
Know that whosoever finds wisdom finds life and shall obtain favour of the Lord.
Get knowledge of the Holy One.
Know that the Lord will not suffer the soul of the righteous to famish.
Know that he becometh poor that dealeth with a slack hand.
Know that the hand of the diligent maketh rich.
Don’t refuse reproof.
Know that fools die for want of wisdom.
Be honest in all your dealings.
Know that God hates dishonesty.
Know that God delights in honesty.
Know that through knowledge shall the just be delivered.
Don’t trust in riches or you will fall.
Know that a good man obtains the favour of the Lord.
Know that he that works his land will be satisfied with bread.
Know that the hard work of a man will be rewarded to him.
Delight the Lord through honest dealings.
Don’t be seduced by the ways of the wicked.
Take the pathway of righteousness.
Know that in the way of righteousness is life and no death.
Choose your friends wisely.
Don’t be a companion of fools.
Walk with wise men.
Know that the righteous eat to the satisfying of their soul.
Know that the belly of the wicked shall want.
Turn away wrath with a soft answer.
Let your tongue be a tree of life.
Let your lips disperse knowledge.
Let your words be pleasant words.
Think before you answer.
Know that everyone who is proud in heart is an abomination to the Lord.
Know that by the fear of the Lord men depart from evil.
Know that when a man’s ways please the Lord, He makes his enemies to be at peace with him.
Seek understanding rather than silver.
Seek wisdom rather than gold.
Know that a haughty spirit goes before a fall.
Know that pride goes before destruction.
Be slow to anger.
Allow reproof to enter in.
Do not reward evil for good.
Leave off contention.
Love friends at all times.
Don’t become surety for a friend.
Don’t let your lips enter into contention.
Don’t let your lips become a snare.
Don’t be a talebearer.
Know that death and life are in the power of the tongue.
Don’t let your soul lack knowledge.
Don’t be a false witness.
Don’t speak lies.
Don’t be idle.
Don’t be slothful.
Have pity on the poor and give.
Chasten thy son while there is hope.
Stop listening to the instructions that cause you to err.
Don’t ignore the cry of the poor.
Do not wander out of the way of understanding.
Follow after righteousness and mercy.
Watch your tongue and know when to keep your mouth shut.
Choose a good name rather than great riches.
Train up a child in the way they should go.
Know that the borrower is servant to the lender.
Bless the poor and be blessed.
Give your bread to the poor.
Have a bountiful eye.
Cast out the scorner.
Drive out foolishness from the heart of a child.
Hear the words of the wise.
Cease from your own wisdom.
Don’t labour to be rich.
Apply your ears to the words of knowledge.
Apply your heart to instruction.
Don’t withhold correction from a child.
Be in the fear of the Lord all the day long.
Be strong.
Increase in strength.
Don’t think foolish thoughts.
Don’t rejoice when your enemy falls or stumbles.
Say not, I will do so to him as he hath done to me.
Consider the field of the slothful.
If your enemy is hungry, feed them.
If your enemy is thirsty, give them water.
Don’t seek your own glory.
Don’t make great excuses to defend laziness.
Don’t boast about what you will do tomorrow.
Let another man praise you and not your own lips.
Welcome the faithful wounds of a friend.
Know your place and do not step out of it.
Take pleasure from hearty counsel with friends.
Don’t forsake close friends or friends of the family.
Foresee evil and avoid it.
Help friends and be helped by them.
Know that the heart of a man is reflected by the man.
Know that the eyes of man are never satisfied.
Manage your investments and take care of your assets.
Be as bold as a lion.
Contend with the wicked.
Confess and forsake your sin.
Don’t cover up your sins.
Hate covetousness.
Don’t hide your eyes from the poor.
Do not resist reproof.
Love wisdom.
Do not keep company with harlots.
Don’t accept bribes.
Sing and rejoice.
Consider the cause of the poor.
Turn away wrath.
Know that it is foolish to speak about everything that comes into your mind.
Don’t speak your mind hastily.
Don’t leave a child to their own devices.
Correct thy son.
Do not be hasty to speak.
Don’t partner with a thief.
Know that the fear of man brings a snare.
Know that he who puts his trust in the Lord shall be safe.
Know that God is a shield to them that put their trust in Him.
Accuse not a servant unto his master.
Plead the cause of the poor and needy.
Don’t eat the bread of idleness.
Be more ready to listen than to speak.
Let your words be few.
Fear God, and keep his commandments: this is our duty.
Cease to do evil.
Trust God and fix your thoughts on Him and you will remain in perfect peace.
Take counsel from the Lord.
Follow the directions of the Lord.
Cast away your idols and be blessed.
Know that the Lord will not give His glory to another.
Know that you were created by God for His Glory.
Look to God and be saved.
Know that God declares the end from the beginning.
Stop spending time, money and energy on what does not satisfy.
Forsake unrighteous thoughts.
Know that there is no peace for the wicked.
Know that wickedness deprives a man of blessings.
Know that sin robs a man of good things.
Glory in understanding and knowing me saith the Lord.
Know that the heart is the most deceitful of all things and desperately wicked.
Hope and quietly wait for the salvation of the Lord.
Turn from your wickedness and do that which is lawful and right.
Repent and turn yourself from all your transgressions.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is merciful.
Know that God is slow to anger.
Know that God is of great kindness.
Know that God is always ready to forgive.
Seek the Lord and ye shall live.
Know that God is gracious.
Know that God is merciful.
Know that God is slow to anger.
Know that God is of great kindness.
Know that God is always ready to forgive.
Give God the honour He deserves.
Don’t offer God your second best.
Know that God does not change.
Don’t rob God of tithes and offerings.
Know that Jesus is of the line of David and Abraham.
Know that God’s plans span many generations.
Know that Jesus was conceived in Mary by the Holy Spirit.
Know that God chooses people to be part of His plans.
Know that God can make the impossible happen.
Know that God is a worker of miracles.
Know that God shows us examples of right behaviour.
Take time to think things through before deciding what to do.
Let God influence your decisions.
Know that God sends angels to speak to people.
Expect encounters with Angels.
Know that God speaks to us.
Know that God may speak to you in a dream.
Take note when you dream. Is God speaking to you?
Know that Jesus was born to save His people from their sins.
Know that God foretells the future before it happens.
Know that God gives us the ultimate example of right behaviour by coming in person.
Know that the birth of Jesus fulfilled many prophecies.
Know that all God’s prophecies will eventually be fulfilled.
Know that God does what He says He will do.
Do as the Lord bids you straight away.
Know that Jesus was born of the virgin Mary.
Know that God gives us His Word so that we may learn by example.
Know that Jesus was born in Bethlehem of Judaea, the city of David.
Know that even from birth Jesus was the King of the Jews.
Know that wise men receive revelation from God.
Know that wise men seek Jesus that they may worship Him.
Know that God had already foretold where Jesus would be born.
Know that the wise men were led by a star to where the baby Jesus was.
Know that a star appeared and stood over where Jesus was born.
Fall down and worship Jesus.
Know that God may send warning to you in a dream.
Know that the plans of evil men cannot prevent God’s plans.
Repent for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
Bring forth fruits meet for repentance.
Know that trees which do not bring forth good fruit are hewn down and burned.
Bring forth good fruit.
Fulfil all righteousness.
Know that Jesus is the beloved Son of God.
Defeat the tempter with the Word of God.
Know God’s written Word.
Live by every word of God.
Thou shalt not tempt the Lord thy God.
Worship the Lord thy God and serve Him only.
Repent for the kingdom of heaven is at hand.
Accept the invitation of Jesus: "Follow me."
Become a fisher of men.
Go about healing all manner of sickness and disease among the people.
Go about teaching and preaching the gospel.
Open your mouth and teach others about discipleship.
Humble yourself and acknowledge your spiritual poverty.
Acknowledge your utter reliance on God in all things.
Mourn over the sin in the world and those without Christ.
Mourn with godly sorrow over your sins and you will be comforted.
Know that those that mourn shall be comforted.
Be humble.
Hunger and thirst after righteousness.
Know that those who hunger and thirst after righteousness will be satisfied.
Be merciful.
Know that those who are merciful will obtain mercy.
Be pure in heart.
Know that the pure in heart will see God.
Be a peacemaker.
Expect and suffer persecution for righteousness’ sake.
Expect persecution and false accusation for Jesus’ sake.
Rejoice in times of persecution for Jesus’ sake.
Be the salt of the earth.
Be the light of the world.
Let the light in you shine so others can see your good works and give glory to God.
Don’t look lustfully at a woman.
Bless them that curse you.
Do good to them that hate you.
Love your enemies.
Pray for them which despitefully use you and persecute you.
Be perfect, even as your Father which is in heaven is perfect.
Give to the poor and needy in secret.
Don’t make a big show of giving to the poor and needy.
When giving: don’t let your left hand know what your right hand is doing.
Don’t make a big show of praying.
Pray in secret.
Don’t use many words and vain repetitions when you pray.
Know that your heavenly Father knows your needs before you ask Him.
Establish God’s kingdom and will in the earth.
Feed each day on Jesus the bread of life.
Forgive others so that your heavenly Father will forgive you.
Don’t harbour unforgiveness.
Don’t make a big show of fasting.
Fast in secret.
Don’t seek to amass earthly treasure.
Amass treasures in heaven.
Set your heart on the things of heaven.
Let your eye be single.
Don’t let the light that is in you be darkness.
Choose between God or money - you cannot serve both.
Take no thought for your life, what you will eat, drink or wear.
Behold the fowls of the air and how the Father feeds them.
Realise the value God places on you. Have faith and trust in Him.
Realise that you cannot achieve anything by worrying.
Consider the lilies of the field.
Take no thought for what you will wear.
Realise that our Father in heaven knows all of our needs before we ask.
Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness.
Seek first the kingdom of God and His righteousness and all that you need will be provided.
Don’t worry about tomorrow. Concentrate on today.
Don’t condemn others so that you yourself are not likewise condemned.
Know that you will be judged the same way that you judge others.
Know that the measure that you deal to others will be dealt to you.
Don’t look for lesser faults in others whilst ignoring greater faults of your own.
Don’t try to address the lesser faults of others whilst possessing far greater faults.
Consider the hypocrisy of how you judge your brother.
First address your own greater faults before considering the lesser faults of others.
Don’t present the gospel to those who repeatedly mock, scorn and deride it.
Don’t waste the message of truth on those who ignorantly reject it.
Ask, seek, knock. God is waiting for your request.
Ask, and it shall be given to you.
Seek, and ye shall find.
Knock, and it shall be opened unto you.
Know that everyone who asks receives.
Know that he who seeks shall find.
Know that to him that knocks it shall be opened.
Ask your Father in heaven for good things.
Know that your Father in heaven wishes to give good things to those who ask.
Do to others as you would have them do to you.
Seek the narrow way that leads to life.
Don’t go along the broad way with the many that leads to destruction.
Know that there are few that find the narrow way that leads to life.
Beware of false prophets.
Know that false prophets disguise themselves outwardly.
Recognise false prophets by their fruits despite their outward appearance.
Know that every good tree yields good fruit but a corrupt tree yields evil fruit.
Know that a good tree cannot yield evil fruit, neither can a corrupt tree yield good fruit.
Know that every tree that does not yield good fruit is cut down and burned.
Know false prophets by their fruits.
Know that not all who call Jesus Lord will enter the kingdom of heaven.
Know that only those that do the will of the Father will enter the kingdom of heaven.
Know that many wonderful works will not save you.
Seek to know Jesus personally.
Hear and do what Jesus says.
Build your house upon a rock.
Know that tribulation and adversity will come and beat against your house.
Know that every house built on the rock of Christ will not fall.
Don’t build your house upon sand.
Don’t ignore and fail to do what Jesus says.
Know that every house not built on the rock of Christ will greatly fall.
Be taught by the one who teaches with authority.
Allow Jesus to bring a great calm to your life.
Marvel at Jesus the Son of God: He is amazing!
Cast out devils. Tell them to "Go."
Reach out to Jesus: your faith can make you whole.
Expect to be laughed to scorn for your faith.
Don’t plan on needing money to do His work.
See the divine nature in people, not their humanity.
Come to Jesus and find rest.
Learn about Jesus.
Take the yoke of Jesus upon you.
Know that a man is not defiled by what goes into the mouth.
Know that a man is defiled by what comes out of the mouth.
Know that God wants us to discern the signs of the times.
Beware of false doctrine.
Know that even today many people do not know who Jesus really is.
Know that God gives revelation to men.
Savour the things of God and not those of men.
Deny yourself and take up your cross and follow Jesus.
Know that whoever gives up their life for Jesus will find everalsting life.
Know that when Jesus comes again He will reward every man according to his works.
Don’t commit adultery.
Know that with God all things are possible.
Violently make time and space for prayer.
Make you and your house a house of prayer.
Know that many are called but few are chosen.
Know that God is not the God of the dead but of the living.
Call no man your father upon the earth.
Know that you have a Father in heaven.
Beware that no man deceives you.
Be ready for when Jesus comes again at a time that no one expects.
Watch and pray so that you do not enter into temptation.
Run with great joy and deliver the good news that Jesus is risen.
Baptize all nations in the name of the Father, Son and Holy Ghost.
Know that Jesus is with you always - even to the end of the world.
Teach all nations to observe whatsoever Jesus commanded.
Deny yourself and take up your cross and follow Jesus.
Know that all things are possible to him who believes.
Do not commit adultery.
Do not kill.
Do not steal.
Do not bear false witness.
Do not defraud anyone.
Honour thy father and thy mother.
Believe that you will receive what you pray for.
Love God with everything you’ve got!
Thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy heart, soul, mind and strength.
Love your neighbour as yourself.
Thou shalt love thy neighbour as thyself.
Go into all the world and preach the gospel to every creature.
Know that the Holy Spirit is the power of God.
Do to others as you would have them do to you.
Be kind to the unthankful and the evil.
Lend, hoping for nothing in return.
Be merciful.
Don’t fall away in a time of temptation.
Deny yourself and take up your cross daily and follow Jesus.
Learn how to pray from Jesus.
Ask for the Holy Spirit.
Be ready because Jesus will return when you least expect.
Strive to enter in at the narrow gate.
Know that he who exalts himself will be humiliated.
Know that he who humbles himself will be exalted.
Do not commit adultery.
Know that Jesus came to find and to save those who are lost.
Know that Satan can enter into people.
Know that God foretells the future before it happens.
Know that Satan desires to possess people.
Know that God foretells the future before it happens.
Follow Mary’s advice: Whatever Jesus says to you - do it.
Know that you must be born again.
Believe in Jesus and live forever.
Worship God in spirit and in truth.
Know that the Son only does the things that He sees the Father do.
Know that the Son does nothing of His own will.
Know that the Father loves the Son.
Know that the Father shows the Son all the things that He Himself does.
Know that miracles are to make men marvel.
Know that the Father judges no man.
Know that the Father has committed all judgement to His Son Jesus.
Know that the Father has given Jesus all authority to execute judgement.
Labour to satisfy your spiritual hunger not your physical hunger.
Do the work of God: believe on Him who He has sent.
Eat the bread that came down from heaven and live forever.
Continue in God’s Word, know the truth and be set free.
Know the truth and be made free.
Don’t be the servant of sin.
Know that whoever sins is the servant of sin.
Allow the Son to set you free.
Know that if the Son shall set you free ye shall be free indeed.
Know that God sent Jesus into the world.
Don’t believe the lies of the devil.
Know that the devil is a liar and the father of it.
Know that the devil was a murderer from the beginning.
Love one another like Jesus.
Believe in Jesus and do the works He did.
Do greater works than Jesus.
Know that obedience attracts the love of the Father.
Know that obedience is the proof of love for Jesus.
Know that obedience yields intimacy with Jesus.
Know that the Holy Spirit will teach you all things.
Know that Jesus gives us peace.
Let not your heart be troubled, neither let it be afraid.
Know that a troubled heart and a fearful heart is not a heart of peace.
Know that without Jesus you can do nothing.
Glorify the Father: bear much fruit.
Know that the world hated Jesus before it hated you.
Know that the Holy Spirit will guide you into all truth.
Know that the Holy Spirit will show you things to come.
Pray, asking in Jesus’ name, that your joy may be full.
Repent and be baptized in the name of Jesus Christ.
Go about doing good and healing all that are oppressed by the devil.
Know that God commands all men everywhere to repent.
Know that God has appointed a day for the judgement of the world.
Know that God will judge the world with righteousness.
Know that the judgement of the world will be by Jesus Christ.
Know that we are sanctified by faith in Jesus.
Live by faith.
Know that to judge others is to condemn yourself.
Know that God’s judgement is true.
Don’t think that you will escape the judgement of God.
Know that the goodness of God leads you to repentance.
Know that God will render to every man according to his deeds.
Continue patiently in well doing.
Know that there is no respect of persons with God.
Know that it is not the hearers but the doers of the law that are justified before God.
Know that by the deeds of the law shall no man be justified.
Know that no man can avoid sin by human effort or law-keeping.
Know that the righteousness of God is by faith in Jesus to all who believe.
Know that all have sinned and come short of the glory of God.
Know that redemption is found in Christ Jesus.
Know that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law.
Know that God is the God of the Jews and of the Gentiles.
Know that Jesus was delivered for our offences.
Know that Jesus was raised again for our justification.
Know that you are justified by faith.
Know that you have peace with God through the Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that we are dead to sin.
Know that we are to no longer live in sin.
Know that we were baptised into the death of Jesus Christ.
Know that you are buried with Christ by baptism into death.
Know that Jesus was raised up from the dead by the glory of the Father.
Walk in newness of life.
Know that we were planted with Christ in both death and resurrection.
Know that we were raised with Christ from the dead to walk in newness of life.
Know that our old nature was crucified with Jesus.
Know that our old body of sin has been destroyed so that we no longer serve sin.
Know that death with Christ has freed us from sin.
Reckon yourself dead to sin but alive to God through Jesus Christ.
Do not let sin reign in your mortal body.
Do not obey the sinful lusts of your mortal body.
Do not yield your members as instruments of unrighteousness to sin.
Yield yourself to God.
Yield yourself unto God as one alive from the dead.
Yield your members as instruments of righteousness to God.
Know that sin does not have dominion over you.
Know that you are not under the law but under grace.
Know that you are his servant to whom so ever you yield to obey.
Don’t be a servant of sin unto death.
Be a servant of obedience unto righteousness.
Thank God that you are no longer a servant to sin.
Know that when you were freed from sin you became a servant of righteousness.
Yield your members servants to righteousness unto holiness.
Remember that when you served sin you were free from righteousness.
Recall the fruit of the shameful things you did for the end of those things is death.
Know that being freed from sin you became a servant of God.
Know that being freed from sin you bear fruit unto holiness and everlasting life.
Know that the wages of sin is death.
Know that God has already passed His sentence upon the sinner.
Know that even though God sees a man as a sinner, He still loves him and desires to redeem him.
Know that the gift of God is eternal life through Jesus Christ the Lord.
Know that the law has dominion over a man as long as he lives.
Know that you are dead to the law by the body of Christ.
Bring forth fruit unto God.
Know that when you were in the flesh your members brought forth fruit unto death.
Know that you are delivered from the law to serve in newness of life.
Know that the law is holy, just and good.
Know that the law serves to reveal the ugliness of sin.
Know that there is no condemnation to those in Christ Jesus.
Know that you no longer walk in the flesh but in the Spirit.
Know that the Spirit of life in Christ Jesus has freed you from the law of sin and death.
Know that the righteousness of the law is fulfilled by those who walk after the Spirit.
Know that those who are carnal mind the things of the flesh.
Know that those who are spiritual mind the things of the Spirit.
Mind the things of the Spirit.
Know that to be carnally minded is death.
Know that to be spiritually minded is life and peace.
Know that the carnal mind is an enemy of God and cannot be subject to the law of God.
Know that they that are in the flesh cannot please God.
Know that you are not in the flesh if God’s Holy Spirit dwells in you.
Know that if a man does not have the Holy Spirit he does not belong to Christ.
Know that if Christ is in you then the body is dead.
Know that the same Holy Spirit that raised Jesus from the dead lives in you.
Know that the Holy Spirit in you will quicken your mortal body.
Don’t live after the flesh or you will die.
Know that if you live after the flesh you will die.
Mortify the deeds of the body through the Spirit and live.
Know that those that are led by the Spirit are the sons of God.
Know that you did not receive the Spirit to remain a slave to fear.
Know that you received the Spirit of adoption to live as a son of God.
Because the Spirit dwells in you, cry "Abba, Father".
Know that the Holy Spirit bears witness to your spirit that you are a child of God.
Know that you are a joint heir with Christ.
Know that the Holy Spirit prays in us and for us.
Know that all things work together for good to them that love God.
Know that you are destined to be conformed to the image of Christ.

Know that nothing can separate us from the love of God.

Live in a way that is holy and pleasing to God.
Don’t be conformed to the standards of the world around you.
Be transformed by the renewing of your mind.
Adopt a godly mindset.
Be certain of God’s will for your life and put it into action.
Know that God’s will is good, perfect and acceptable.
Don’t think more highly of yourself than you should.
Think soberly.
Play your part in the body of Christ.
Know that we are one body in Christ.
Know that everyone is a member of one another.
Know that we each have different gifts according to the grace given to us.
Hate evil things.
Cleave to that which is good.
Be kindly affectioned to one another with brotherly love.
Do not be slothful in business.
Be frevant in spirit, serving the Lord.
Rejoice in hope.
Be patient in tribulation.
Be continually instant in prayer.
Give to the necessity of the saints.
Be given to hospitality.
Bless them which persecute you.
Bless and do not curse or resent others.
Rejoice with them that rejoice.
Weep with them that weep.
Be of the same mind as one another.
Live in harmony with one another.
Condescend to men of low estate.
Do not be wise in your own conceits.
Provide things honest in the sight of all men.
Do not recompense evil for evil to any man.
Live peacably with all men as far as this is possible.
Do not avenge yourself.
Give place to wrath.
Leave vengeance to the Lord.
Know that vengeance belongs to the Lord.
Feed your enemy if they are hungry.
Give drink to your enemy if they are thirsty.
Don’t be overcome by evil but overcome evil with good.
Be subject to the higher powers ordained by God.
Know that there is no power but of God.
Know that the powers that be are ordained by God.
Honour those in authority.
Do not resist those placed in authority by God.
Know that rulers will praise you for good work.
Know that authority is placed over you for your good.
Know that those in authority are the ministers of God.
Be subject to authority for conscience sake.
Pay your taxes.
Pay taxes to whoever they are due.

Know that every tongue shall confess to God.
Know that every one of us shall give account of them self to God.
Know that we are sanctified by the Holy Spirit.
Know that God is faithful.
Know that we have the mind of Christ.
Flee fornication.
Glorify God in your body and spirit.
Exercise self control in all things.
Know that God will not allow temptations beyond which you are able to cope.
Know that the temptations you experience are common to all men.
Use the escape route God always provides when temptation arises.
Whatever you do, do all to the glory of God.
Desire the spiritual gift of prophecy.
Don’t be ignorant of Satan’s devices.
Don’t let Satan get an advantage over you.
Know that where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is freedom.
Walk by faith, not by sight.

Know that godly sorrow leads to repentance and salvation.

Take every thought captive to the obedience of Christ.

Know that God the Father raised Jesus from the dead.
Know that grace and peace come from God the Father and from our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that Jesus gave Himself for our sins.

Know that the sacrifice of Jesus for our salvation was the will of God our Father.
Know that God wants to deliver us from this present evil world.
Know that God is our Father.
Give glory to God our Father for ever and ever.

Seek to please God, not men.

Know that the servant of Christ must not seek to please men.

Know that we are taught by Jesus when we enter into relationship with God.

Beware of false brethren who seek to bring you into bondage.

Know that you are dead to the law and alive unto God.

Know that you are crucified with Christ and no longer live but Christ lives in you.

Know that no man is justified by the law in the sight of God.

Know that after faith has come we are no longer under the law.

Know that relationship with Christ has enabled your adoption as a child of God.
Know that there is no difference between those who are in Christ Jesus.

Know that as a child of God we receive the Holy Spirit into our heart.
Know that the Holy Spirit of God in our heart causes us to cry Abba, Father.
Know that you are no more a servant but a son and heir of God through Christ.

Walk in the Spirit and you will escape from sinful desires.
Be led by the Spirit.
Bear the fruit of the Spirit.
Do good to all men, especially to those in the faith.

Know that our faith has brought us into Christ Jesus.
Know that our faith has brought us into the body of Christ Jesus.

Know that Jesus is Lord.

Know that God is worthy of praise.
Know that God is the Father of our Lord Jesus Christ.
Know that God has a Son whose name is Jesus Christ.
Know that we are blessed with all spiritual blessings in heavenly places in Christ.

Know that we were chosen by God in Christ before the creation of the world.

Know that God raised Jesus from the dead.

Know that you were once dead in trespasses and sins but God has made you alive.

Know that Satan is currently the ruler of this world.
Know that Satan is the spirit now working in the children of disobedience.
Know that you are no longer a child of disobedience ruled by Satan.

Know that God’s love for us is great.
Know that God has demonstrated His great love for us.
Know that our salvation came because God loves us.
Know that God’s love for us is not prompted by some lovable characteristics in us but by His nature of love.
Know that we were once dead in sins.

Know that mercy is not getting what we deserve.

Know that God is gracious to us even when we were dead in sins.

Know that we were raised from death together with Christ and are seated in heaven in Christ.
Know that we have been appointed a place to eat and drink at the Lord’s table in heaven.

Know that God gives us gifts that we do not deserve.
Know that our salvation is through faith.
Know that our faith is not our own: it is a gift of God.

Know that God has a plan and a purpose for your life.

Remember how you lived according to the flesh in the past.

Know that you are called by name.
Walk with all lowliness and meakness.

Know that there is one God and Father of all.

Be renewed in the spirit of your mind.
Adopt the mindset of Christ.

Stop stealing.

As a dear child of God, seek to be like God your Father.
Live a life full of love, loving others as Christ loves us.
Know that Jesus sacrificed Himself as an offering to God for us.
Let no man deceive you with vain words.
Know that the days in which we live are evil.
Remember that you are one flesh with Christ.
Be strong in the Lord and in the power of His might.

Take the shield of faith.
Take the helmet of salvation.
Take the sword of the Spirit.

Know that you are holy and blameless in His sight without accusation.

Think about heavenly things and not earthly things.
Know that you are dead and that your life is hid with Christ in God.

Do not lie to one another.

Know that God shows no respect of persons when passing judgement.
Turn from idols to serve the living and true God.
Walk worthy of God, who has called you to His kingdom and glory.

Be patient with everyone.

Know that grace, mercy and peace come from God our Father and His Son, our Lord, Jesus, the Messiah.

Stir up the gift of God that is in you.
Keep the fire of God burning brightly within you.
Make full use of the gifts of the Holy Spirit that is in you.

Be strong in the grace that is in Jesus Christ.

Be clothed in humility.
Know that God resists the proud but gives grace to the humble.
Humble yourself under the mighty hand of God that He may exalt you in due time.
Be vigilant.
Increase in grace and peace through the knowledge of God and Jesus.
Know that God has given us all we need for life and godliness.
Know that God has called us to glory and excellence.
Escape the corruption of the world.
Receive the great and precious promises of God.
Know that corruption is in the world through lust.
Give diligence to make your calling and election sure.
Make an effort to be godly.
Know that God wishes no man to perish but that all should come to repentance.
Grow in grace and in the knowledge of our Lord and Saviour Jesus Christ.
Know that Jesus was with God from the beginning.
Know that the apostles were witnesses who heard, gazed steadfastly upon and touched Jesus.
Know that Jesus is eternal.
Know that we have fellowship with the Father and His Son Jesus Christ.
Know that Jesus came so that we could have fellowship with the Father and His Son Jesus Christ.
Be joyful in the fellowship and eternal life that you have in Jesus.
Know that God is light and in Him is no darkness at all.
Don’t deceive yourself saying "I have no sin."
Confess your sins and be forgiven and cleansed of all unrighteousness.
Know that Jesus is the propitiation for you and the sins of the whole world.
Know that those who know God keep His commandments.
Love your brother.
Stop loving the world.
Do not love the world or the things that are in the world.
Know that he who does the will of God abides forever.
Know that God has promised us eternal life.
Behold what manner of love the Father has bestowed upon us.
Know that you are a child of God.
Know that when Jesus comes again we shall be like Him.
Purify yourself to be like Christ because of the hope that is in you.
Know that Jesus was manifested to take away our sins.
Know that in Jesus is no sin.
Know that Jesus came to destroy the works of the devil.
Love one another.
Do not marvel when the world hates you.
Do not love in word but in deed and in truth.
Know that when we please Him we receive everything we ask of Him.
Keep His commandments.
Do the things that are pleasing in His sight.
Believe on the name of Jesus Christ.
Love one another as Jesus commanded.
Know that He abides in you by the Holy Spirit which He has given you.
Do not believe every person that you hear but test whether they are of God.
Know that there are many false prophets in the world.
Know that everyone who confesses that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is of God.
Know that everyone who denies that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh is not of God.
Know that the spirit of antichrist will come and is already in the world.
Know that greater is He that is in you than he that is in the world.
Know that those who are not of God speak of the world and the world hears them.
Let us love one another for love is of God.
Confess that Jesus is the Son of God.
Know that God is love.
Allow perfect love to cast out all your fear.
Don’t be tormented by fear.
Love God because He first loved you.
Know that your faith gives you the victory to overcome the world.
Overcome the world.
Keep yourself from idols.
Earnestly contend for the faith.
Hear what the Spirit saith unto the churches.
Know that God rebukes and chastens those whom He loves.
Be zealous and repent.
Know that all things are and were created by God and for His pleasure.
Know that the devil seeks to deceive the whole world.
Know that the devil was cast out into the earth and his angels with him.
Don’t be an accuser of the brethren.
Know that the devil accuses the brethren before God day and night.
